answer:"LEROK",row:7,col:2}}};export default function UtakAtikGathukMurda(){const[isCorrect,setIsCorrect]=useState(false);const navigate=useNavigate();const handleCrosswordCorrect=()=>{setIsCorrect(true);};const handleNextPage=()=>{navigate("/sandhangan/kuis5/nyocokakegambarsandhangan");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"crossword-contain",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"p-20 m-5 text-center",children:"Utak Atik Gathuk Sandhangan"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"crossword-game-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"crossword",style:{width:"500px",height:"500px"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Crossword,{data:data,onCrosswordCorrect:handleCrosswordCorrect})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"crossword-clues-with-images",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"crossword-clue",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:ketoprak,alt:"Ketoprak",className:"crossword-clue-image"})," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"1 Down"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"crossword-clue",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:janger,alt:"Janger",className:"crossword-clue-image"})," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"2 Down"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"crossword-clue",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:wayang,alt:"Wayang",className:"crossword-clue-image"})," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"3 Across"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"crossword-clue",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:lerok,alt:"lerok",className:"crossword-clue-image"})," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"4 Down"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"crossword-clue",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:ludruk,alt:"ludruk",className:"crossword-clue-image"})," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"4 Across"})]})]})]}),isCorrect&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleNextPage,className:"btn btn-primary mt-4",children:"Next Page"})})]});}
